name: 劉素娥
objective: 本課程目標為提升學生英文之閱讀能力與聽力。包含增加英文單字數量，科技論文文法、句型、結構等特質，及訓練聽力習慣。
schedule:
Syllabus課程進度
Week 1: ‧Opening 
Week 2:
‧Speaking - How to introduce yourself 自我介紹
‧Reading & Listening - CD – Weekend Activities 聽力-週末活動
‧How to ask questions about hobbies and leisure activities 愛好及休閒活動
‧Grammar - Parts of speech各種詞類
‧Grammar - present/past/future tenses時態各種文法規則
‧Vocabulary - prefixed and suffixes如何擴大自己的字彙庫
‧Business etiquette www.voa365.com 商業禮節
‧Pronunciation – British, American, Canadian, Australian, and Indian. 各國英語發音區別
‧How to write a request of absence letter 如何寫請事/病/休假
Week 3: 
‧Writing – resume / CV 履歷表模板
‧Job searching tips 求職小秘訣
‧What preparations are required for an interview 如何準備面試
‧Interview technique 面試技巧
‧Soft skills 軟技巧
‧Grammar - how to make questions - The 1,2,3,4,5 Rule 文法規則
‧What, Who, Whom, Why, Where, Which, and How 問句用法
‧How to form a sentence - subject, verb, object, connections 如何形成句子
‧How to connect between sentences, comparative pairs, conjunctions 如何連句
‧Comprehension exercise 理解力練習
‧Articles: a/an/the 冠詞用法
Week 4: 
‧Culture difference between American and Chinese 了解中西文化差異
‧Grammar logic difference between American and Chinese中西句法邏輯
‧The most commonly used sentence/phrase 歐美人最愛用的句子
‧Phrases/MP4 song lyrics 優美歌詞句朗記
‧Cloze practice 克漏字填充技巧
‧How to begin a paragraph 文章/演講如何開頭
‧Famous quotes and proverbs 善用名人格言,強而有力
Week 5: 
‧Engineering roles and responsibilities 工程師角色及責任
‧Roles of research, design, process, production, quality, testing, equipment 工程師種類
‧Software and hardware engineers 軟硬體工程師
‧Email writing / replying Email 如何寫/回 email
‧Resume/CV Writing 履歷內容
‧Job searching cover letter writing 求職信
‧Thank you letter after interview 感謝信
‧Information Technology English 科技英語
‧Engineering English 專業工程英語
‧Business environment common terminology 職場常用專有名詞
‧Grammar - what are prepositions and their usage 介詞
‧Similar words but different meaning. ex. raise, rise, arise 不規則類似詞
Week 6:　　
‧Video演說技巧
‧Presentation structure 演說文最佳結構
‧Essay/speech writing golden formula 基本寫作文萬用公式 
‧Arguments writing technique 議論文寫作
‧Thanks/ sorry /misunderstanding letter writing 感謝及道歉函
‧Most commonly used conversation speaking tips 常用短語會話
‧Team meeting notice writing formula 如何寫會議邀請函
‧Proper use of What, Who, When, Where, Why, Which, How 正確問句用法
‧Proper use of prepositions, conjunctions, nouns, verbs 介詞,連接詞,名詞,動詞用法
‧Proper use of adjectives, adverbs 形容詞, 副詞用法
Week 7:　　
‧Accent pronunciation發音訓練
‧Phonemic Symbols - Vowels and consonants 音標練習
‧Homonym and heteronym 同音異義 及 異音異義
‧Minimal pairs and contractions 配對及縮寫
‧Intonation/Connection links 音韻及連接發音
‧Syllables and word stress 音節及重音
‧How to improve listening skills 如何增進聽力
‧How to make a query to suppliers 如何問供應商產品規格
Week 8:　　
‧Business etiquette 職場禮節,稱呼,打招呼
‧Telephone etiquette; how to leave/take message電話禮節
‧Engineering presentation skills 工程簡報/解說技巧
‧Business presentation skills商業簡報技巧
‧Build a business presentation 簡潔簡報須知
‧Communication skills/body language 溝通技巧
‧‧Interpersonal relationships 做人處事人際關係的重要性
